Module kivakit.kernel
Package com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.logging.logs

Class BaseLog

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.logging.logs.BaseLog
All Implemented Interfaces:
Filtered<LogEntry>, Closeable, Flushable, Operation, Startable, Stoppable, Named, Log, AutoCloseable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseTextLog
public abstract class BaseLog extends Object implements Startable, Stoppable, Log
Base class for log implementations. Handles background queueing of log entries.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
